"},"$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-BeiShiGaoZhong_4/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-BeiShiGaoZhong_4/readme","text":"[img height=200 [https://nos.netease.com/ydschool-online/reciteWord_BeiShiGaoZhong_4.jpg]] 此学习包共有 336 个来源于北师大版高中教材的单词。北师大版普通高中课程标准实验教科书，同步收录教科书中所有课程词汇。官方权威词库来源，有针对性地搭配合适的中英释意、英文例句、词组短语、同近义词，丰富学习内容。结合背单词科学记忆方法，帮助用户在语境中学习词汇，系统地训练加深理解，拓展思维。适用于正在学习本书的用户同步课堂学习内容，课前预习，课后复习等用途。 可在 [[钓鱼手册|https://oflg.github.io/fishing-manual/#安装:安装%20鱼罐头子插件]] 查看安装使用教程。","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki"},"$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-BeiShiGaoZhong_4]plugintiddlers[]tag[?]]":{"title":"$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-BeiShiGaoZhong_4]plugintiddlers[]tag[?]]","caption":"北师大版高中必修四"},"$:/BeiShiGaoZhong_4/motivate_1":{"title":"$:/BeiShiGaoZhong_4/motivate_1","word":"motivate","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-BeiShiGaoZhong_4/Word}}","created":"20220402074148365","transCn":"vt. 使有动机，促使，激发
